column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////In a word -- yummy.  The only downside would be that it is often packed because everyone ELSE thinks it is yummy
column2: too.  My chocolate croissant was divine
column4: and luckily we had a table inside because our friends got there before we did.  I have not tried their cafe items; however
column5: I hear only positive things.  If you can walk there
column6: do it.  If you drive and see an open spot
column7: take it.  This place is a little pricey
